body:
Select  M.MachineNo,D.Machine, MA.Type,MA.AlarmNo, MS.Machine,M.MachineNo,M.MachineName,M.MGroupNo,D.Dyelot,MS.RunState,T.TreatmentNo,T.TreatmentName,MA.AlarmNo,
MGA.Name,MGA.ShortName, MS.* From   Machines M
Left Outer Join  MachineStatus MS On M.MachineNo = MS.Machine
Left Outer Join  Dyelots D On D.DyelotRefNo = MS.DyelotRefNo And D.Machine = M.MachineNo
Left Outer Join   Treatments T On T.TreatmentNo = MS.TreatmentNo
Left Outer Join  MachineAlarm MA On  MS.Alarm = MA.AlarmNo  And MS.DyelotRefNo = MA.DyelotRefNo And MA.Machines_MachineNo = M.MachineNo
LEFT OUTER JOIN  MachGrpAlarm MGA On  MGA.MachGrp_MGroupNo = M .MGroupNo  And  MGA.TypeConfID = MA.AlarmNo
Where M.MachineType <> 2 And M.MachineName  Not In ('PADBATCH', 'HAVUZ')
Order By M.MachineNo asc  

/*
türkçe run state tablosu olacak 
türkçe alarm grup tablosu olacak
*/
